record.title: ORDER OF PROCEDURE

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I know we are in morning business. I will speak in such. I came from a meeting with the majority leader. He indicated a willingness to let me speak without interruption for 20 minutes. If there is no objection, I ask for that, then, by unanimous consent.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: After that, Mr. President, we will go as we can. I know other colleagues are coming. Senator Warner has an amendment he wants to speak to at 3:45.
